quote: Being a good example is the best form of service.
author: Sathya Sai Baba

quote: To wish you were someone else is to waste the person you are.
author: Unknown

quote: The pursuit of mastery bears gifts.
author: Gary Keller

quote: The difference between treason and patriotism is only a matter of dates.
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.
author: Roy T. Bennett
